name: CBC Companies - Scalable Modernization with Messaging-Based Microservices
description: Modernization of legacy application using messaging-based microservices architecture to provide automated risk mitigation system that identifies fraud and misrepresentation in the loan origination process.
challenge: Outdated legacy systems with limited integration capabilities, complex stakeholder ecosystem with shifting priorities, low code reusability increasing development effort, reliance on outdated technologies like .NET Framework 4.8, and absence of documentation impacting onboarding.
solution: Highly scalable messaging-based microservices oriented architecture
Modular APIs enabling easier future enhancements and integration
Seamless user experience maintained during transition
Zero downtime ensured throughout module replacement
Plug-play architecture to switch between old and new applications during transition
Phased rollouts enabling faster user adoption

impact.securityImprovement: Strengthened security measures increased customer trust and confidence
impact.developmentAcceleration: Accelerated development cycles through reusable components
impact.codeStandardization: Standardized code practices across development teams
impact.riskMitigation: Automated fraud and misrepresentation identification in loan origination

outcomes: Improved loan quality through automated risk mitigation
Overall cost reduction in loan origination process
Seamless transition from legacy to modern architecture
Enhanced security posture and customer confidence
Accelerated development cycles with reusable components
